entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning early this evening and ending late this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
